text: Abdilaqim Ademi (December 20, 1969 - February 16, 2018) was a Macedonian politician. He was born in Tetovo, Macedonia. He served as Minister of Education and Science of Macedonia from 2014 until his death in 2017. Ademi died in Tetovo on February 16, 2018 at the age of 48.Ndërron jetë Abdylaqim Ademi, varrimi bëhet sot ==References== ==Other websites== * Ministry Website Category:1969 births Category:2018 deaths Category:North Macedonian politicians
title: Abdilaqim Ademi
